Entries.AdvancedIridiumRodDescription: 可以在水中釣魚。最多同時安裝兩個浮標。
Entries.IridiumScytheDescription: 可以收割所有作物，收集乾草的效果極佳。
Entries.WateringCan_Description: 用於灌溉作物。可以在任意水源重新裝滿。
Entries.Hoe_Description: Used to dig and till soil.
Entries.TrashCan_Description: When trashing an item, you reclaim {0}% of the value.
Entries.FishingRod_Description: Use in the water to catch fish.
Entries.Pan_Iridium_Description: Use to gather ore from streams. Has the best yields of any pan. It also has a chance to immediately cause another panning spot to appear.
Entries.Shears_Description: Use this to collect wool from sheep
Entries.FishingRod_AdvancedIridium_Description: Use in the water to catch fish. Up to two bobbers can be attached at once.
Entries.Pan_Description: Use to gather ore from streams.
Entries.ReturnScepter_Description: The golden handle quivers with raw potential. Hold this scepter to the sky and return home at will.
Entries.Pan_Steel_Description: Use to gather ore from streams. Has bigger and better yields than a copper pan. It also has a small chance to immediately cause another panning spot to appear.
Entries.FishingRod_Training_Description: It's a lot easier to use than other rods, but can only catch basic fish.
Entries.Pan_Gold_Description: Use to gather ore from streams. Has bigger and better yields than a steel pan. It also has a small chance to immediately cause another panning spot to appear.
